name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 16 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there. The hints will help.
First word of six letters -

cooked beaten egg mixture

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of five letters-

lodgings for drivers

Third word of four letters -

large book

Fourth word of three letters -

came together

Fifth word of two letters -

small mountain

New word of seven letters -

slow burning with no flame

Seventh word of six letters -

small piece of food

Eighth word of five letters - 

competitor in last place

Ninth word of four letters -

England's national flower

Final word of three letters - 

metal-bearing mineral
